CustomField.description: NICC-052448 The business reason for your appeal request. This should include benefits that hospitality will receive by prioritizing this project over the existing scheduled projects in the backlog. This field was originally created for records with the Internal Project record type
CustomField.inlineHelpText: Describe the business reason for your appeal request. This should include benefits that hospitality will receive by prioritizing this project over the existing scheduled projects in the backlog.
CustomField.label: Appeal Request Reason
